publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2894 Cathy Jamieson: Education (Disability Strategies And Pupils Records) (Scotland) Bill-That the Parliament agrees that the Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils' Records) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Nicol Stephen*, Margaret Jamieson*

S1M-2894 Cathy Jamieson: Education (Disability Strategies And Pupils Records) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils’ Records) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Nicol Stephen, Margaret Jamieson

S1M-2894 Cathy Jamieson: Education (Disability Strategies And Pupils Records) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Education (Disability Strategies and Pupils’ Records) (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Nicol Stephen, Margaret Jamieson
